Title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
Plot summary: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.
Stars: Bill Hader, Anna Faris, Will Forte, Neil Patrick Harris

Title: The AristoCats
Plot summary: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.
Stars: Phil Harris, Eva Gabor, Sterling Holloway, Scatman Crothers

Title: Triangle
Plot summary: Five friends set sail and their yacht is overturned by a strange and sudden storm. A mysterious ship arrives to rescue them, and what happens next cannot be explained.
Stars: Melissa George, Joshua McIvor, Jack Taylor, Michael Dorman

Title: Snake Eyes
Plot summary: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.
Stars: Nicolas Cage, Gary Sinise, John Heard, Carla Gugino

Title: October Sky
Plot summary: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.
Stars: Jake Gyllenhaal, Chris Cooper, Laura Dern, Chris Owen

Title: Beastly
Plot summary: A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.
Stars: Alex Pettyfer, Vanessa Hudgens, Mary-Kate Olsen, Justin Bradley

Title: Romancing the Stone
Plot summary: A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure hunting for treasure with a mercenary rogue.
Stars: Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito, Zack Norman
